1.0.name: wordpress/jc-where
1.0.description:
JC Where is a very basic plugin which let you know where your site is hosted. If you're working on differents versions of your site (local development, production, home version, ...) and you're switching from one to other, thanks to your hosts file, there's a time when you don't know where you are, and what version you're editing.

This plugin just display the ip address of your host in the footer of your wordpress administration.

more information on jc-where plugin
